Posts.Content: Samanthavt7091 wrote: On October 4th I had a MRI guided biopsy (2). I'm still sore - kinda achy and a little swollen. Is this normal? Is there something else going on I should be concerned about? I'm calling the Breast specialist nurse tomorrow. Dx 9/13/2016, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 2, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 10/25/2016 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Sentinel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Discomfort after a MRI guided biopsy (2 lumps) Samanthavt7091 Samanthavt7091
